TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 描述 物件的連入 HTTP 要求。

span.span: Describes an incoming HTTP request to an object.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當用戶端提出要求時統一資源識別元 (URI) 由物件提供物件，其中包含寄件者、 要求和回應已傳送至用戶端的相關資訊。When a client makes a request to a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) handled by an object, the provides a object that contains information about the sender, the request, and the response that is sent to the client. 屬性會傳回描述要求的物件。The property returns the object that describes the request. 物件包含要求資訊，例如要求字串字串，並要求本文資料 (請參閱屬性)。The object contains information about the request, such as the request string, string, and request body data (see the property). 若要回覆的要求，您必須取得相關聯的回應使用屬性。To reply to the request, you must get the associated response using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何接收並回應程式。The following code example demonstrates how to receive and respond to a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AcceptTypes As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AcceptTypes { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端接受的 MIME 類型。

span.span: Gets the MIME types accepted by the client.

value.span: 陣列，包含要求的 標頭中所指定的類型名稱，如果用戶端要求沒有包含 標頭，則為 。

span.span: A array that contains the type names specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Accept`標頭是以空格分隔的多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 類型名稱的字串 (例如， `image/jpeg`)，表示用戶端已準備好接受和處理在回應中的 MIME 類型。The `Accept` header is a string of space-separated Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type names (for example, `image/jpeg`), which indicate the MIME types that the client is prepared to accept and process in a response. `*/*`項目會指出用戶端會接受任何 MIME 類型。The `*/*` entry indicates that the client accepts any MIME type. 如需詳細的說明`Accept`標頭，請參閱 RFC 2616，可在[ https://www.rfc-editor.org ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a detailed description of the `Accept` header, see RFC 2616, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGetClientCertificate (AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetClientCertificate(class System.AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGetClientCertificate (requestCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetClientCertificate(AsyncCallback ^ requestCallback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給回呼委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 開始用戶端之 X.509 v.3 憑證的非同步要求。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request for the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.
An that indicates the status of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificateError As Integer
public: property int ClientCertificateError { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得錯誤碼，識別用戶端所提供之 的問題。

span.span: Gets an error code that identifies a problem with the provided by the client.

value.span: 值，包含 Windows 錯誤碼。

span.span: An value that contains a Windows error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會包含 Windows 錯誤的程式碼，傳回透過安全通道 (Schannel) 安全性支援提供者介面 (SSPI)，用來驗證憑證。This property contains a Windows error code returned by the Secure Channel (Schannel) Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI), which is used to validate the certificate. 多個安全通道的 SSPI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 建立安全連線使用安全通道 」，在安全性文件中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about SSPI support for Schannel, see "Creating a Secure Connection Using Schannel" in the Security documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查這個屬性來判斷要求是否包含有效的用戶端憑證。The following code example checks this property to determine whether the request includes a valid client certificate. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#3)]

exception.span: 用戶端憑證尚未透過呼叫 或 方法初始化。

span.span: The client certificate has not been initialized yet by a call to the or methods
-or -
The operation is still in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentEncoding As Encoding
public: property System::Text::Encoding ^ ContentEncoding { System::Text::Encoding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用於隨要求所傳送之資料的內容編碼方式。

span.span: Gets the content encoding that can be used with data sent with the request

value.span: 物件，適用於 屬性中的資料。

span.span: An object suitable for use with the data in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可以用來將位元組序列轉換成字元集 （字碼頁） 和成位元組序列的字元。An object can be used to convert byte sequences into character sets (code pages) and characters into byte sequences. 這個屬性會使用的字元集值`Content-Type`標頭來判斷的編碼方式。This property uses the charset value from the `Content-Type` header to determine the encoding. 如果該資訊不是可用的則這個屬性會傳回。If that information is not available, this property returns . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLength64 As Long
public: property long ContentLength64 { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求中所包含之主體資料的長度。

span.span: Gets the length of the body data included in the request.

value.span: 要求之 標頭的值。

span.span: The value from the request's header.

value.span: 如果內容長度未知，則這個值是 -1。

span.span: This value is -1 if the content length is not known.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`標頭表示隨附於要求主體資料的長度，單位為位元組。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the body data that accompanies the request. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用處理本文資料時的屬性。The following code example uses the property while processing body data. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求中所包含之主體資料的 MIME 類型。

span.span: Gets the MIME type of the body data included in the request.

value.span: ，包含要求之 標頭的文字。

span.span: A that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端在要求中包含內容資料，它會宣告中的主體資料的多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 類型`Content-Type`標頭。If a client includes body data in a request, it declares the Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the body data in the `Content-Type` header. 例如，資料的預設 MIME 類型傳回 Web 表單使用`POST`方法`application/x-www-form-urlencoded`。For example, the default MIME type of data returned from a Web form using the `POST` method is `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別和 RFC 2616，可在[ https://www.rfc-editor.org ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration and RFC 2616, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 為 null 時沒有任何`Content-Type`要求標頭。The is null when there is no `Content-Type` header in the request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cookies As CookieCollection
public: property System::Net::CookieCollection ^ Cookies { System::Net::CookieCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得隨要求傳送的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets the cookies sent with the request.

value.span: ，包含要求所隨附的 Cookie。

span.span: A that contains cookies that accompany the request.

value.span: 如果要求沒有包含 Cookie，則這個屬性會傳回空集合。

span.span: This property returns an empty collection if the request does not contain cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是儲存在本機 （用戶端） 電腦的網頁伺服器名稱/值的文字資料。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示與要求送出的 cookie 值。The following code example displays the values of cookies sent with the request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 GetClientCertificate() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取用戶端的 X.509 v.3 憑證。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

returns.span: 物件，包含用戶端的 X.509 v.3 憑證。

span.span: A object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖直到擷取憑證。This method blocks until the certificate is retrieved.

exception.span: 呼叫這個擷取用戶端 X.509 v.3 憑證的方法正在進行中，因此不可再次呼叫這個方法。

span.span: A call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress and therefore another call to this method cannot be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> GetClientCertificateAsync() cil managed
Public Function GetClientCertificateAsync () As Task(Of X509Certificate2)

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，擷取用戶端的 X.509 v.3 憑證。

span.span: Retrieves the client's X.509 v.3 certificate as an asynchronous operation.
Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性傳回包含用戶端之 X.509 v.3 憑證的 物件。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a object that contains the client's X.509 v.3 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件將會完成時在擷取的憑證。The returned object will complete when the certificate has been retrieved. 如果呼叫這個方法，以擷取用戶端的 X.509 v.3 憑證的正在進行中，無法建立另一個呼叫這個方法。If a call to this method to retrieve the client's X.509 v.3 certificate is in progress, then another call to this method cannot be made.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasEntityBody As Boolean
public: property bool HasEntityBody { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出要求是否有關聯的主體資料。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the request has associated body data.

value.span: 如果要求有關聯的主體資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the request has associated body data; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將資料傳送到伺服器時使用的要求`POST`方法，例如，應具有實體主體。A request that sends data to the server using the `POST` method, for example, should have an entity body. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Headers As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 取得在要求中所傳送之標頭名稱/值組的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of header name/value pairs sent in the request.

value.span: ，含有要求中所包含的 HTTP 標頭。

span.span: A that contains the HTTP headers included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求標頭包含中繼資料資訊。Request headers contain metadata information. 例如，標頭可以包含參考用戶端到伺服器的資源統一資源識別元 (URI)，使用者代理程式的身分識別供用戶端，並可接受的 MIME 的回應主體中的資料類型。For example, headers can contain the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server, the identity of the user agent employed by the client, and the acceptable MIME types for data in the response body. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的所有資訊指定物件。The following code example displays all the information in a given object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HttpMethod As String
public: property System::String ^ HttpMethod { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端指定的 HTTP 方法。

span.span: Gets the HTTP method specified by the client.

value.span: ，包含要求中使用的方法。

span.span: A that contains the method used in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 方法通常是 GET 或 POST，根據用戶端所需的動作。The HTTP method is typically GET or POST, depending on the action desired by the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStream As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ InputStream { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含用戶端所傳送之主體資料的資料流。

span.span: Gets a stream that contains the body data sent by the client.

value.span: 可讀取的 物件，包含用戶端在要求的主體中所傳送的位元組。

span.span: A readable object that contains the bytes sent by the client in the body of the request.

value.span: 如果沒有資料隨要求傳送，則這個屬性會傳回 。

span.span: This property returns if no data is sent with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端會將資料傳輸 (例如，使用 HTTP`POST`方法)，這個方法所傳回的資料流包含該資料。If the client transmits data (for example, using the HTTP `POST` method), the stream returned by this method contains that data. > [!NOTE] > 關閉要求時，不會關閉這個屬性所傳回的資料流。Closing the request does not close the stream returned by this property. 當您不再需要資料流時，您應該關閉它藉由呼叫方法。When you no longer need the stream, you should close it by calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來讀取與要求一起傳送的資料。The following code example demonstrates using this property to read the data sent with a request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#16)]

para.span: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

span.span: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the client sending this request is authenticated.

value.span: 如果用戶端已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the client was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式要求用戶端驗證使用或屬性。Your application requests client authentication using the or property. 您的應用程式不會收到未成功驗證的用戶端要求。Your application does not receive an for requests from clients that are not successfully authenticated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

value.span: 如果要求和提供此要求的 物件都來自相同的電腦，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the request originated on the same computer as the object that provided the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行特殊處理，當要求來自本機電腦時，應用程式可以使用這個屬性。Applications can use this property to perform special processing when requests are from the local computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSecureConnection As Boolean
public: property bool IsSecureConnection { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出用來傳送要求的 TCP 連線是否使用 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 通訊協定。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the TCP connection used to send the request is using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol.

value.span: 如果 TCP 連線使用 SSL，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the TCP connection is using SSL; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要要求安全連接，用戶端要求會使用而不是。To request a secure connection, the client request uses instead of . 如果無法使用 SSL 建立的連線，用戶端收到提供錯誤的相關資訊。If the connection cannot be established using SSL, the client receives a that provides information about the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

public: property bool IsWebSocketRequest { bool get(); };

value.span: 傳回 。

value.span: 如果 TCP 連接是 WebSocket 要求則為 ，否則為 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeepAlive As Boolean
public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指出用戶端是否要求持續性連線。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the client requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果連線應該保持開啟，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the connection should be kept open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 用戶端和伺服器預期在短時間內多次交換資料，持續連線會加快其通訊，讓它們能夠避免開啟和關閉每個訊息的 TCP 連線所需的額外負荷。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short time period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 這個屬性的預設值是使用 HTTP/1.1 的用戶端， `true`。For clients using HTTP/1.1, the default value for this property is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalEndPoint As IPEndPoint
public: property System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ LocalEndPoint { System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求所導向到的伺服器 IP 位址和連接埠編號。

span.span: Get the server IP address and port number to which the request is directed.

value.span: ，表示要求傳送至的 IP 位址。

span.span: An that represents the IP address that the request is sent to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要根據的方式處理這些要求回應，這個屬性是很有用。This property is useful when you want to respond to requests based on the way they are addressed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProtocolVersion As Version
public: property Version ^ ProtocolVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求的用戶端所使用的 HTTP 版本。

span.span: Gets the HTTP version used by the requesting client.

value.span: ，識別用戶端的 HTTP 版本。

span.span: A that identifies the client's version of HTTP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可用的文件中指定不同的 HTTP 版本的功能[ https://www.rfc-editor.org ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。The capabilities of different HTTP versions are specified in the documents available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property QueryString As NameValueCollection

summary.span: 取得要求中所包含的查詢字串。

span.span: Gets the query string included in the request.

value.span: 物件，含有要求 中所含的查詢資料。

span.span: A object that contains the query data included in the request .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 URL 中，查詢資訊是由問號 （？） 分隔路徑資訊。In a URL, the query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?). 名稱/值組必須以等號 （=） 分隔。Name/value pairs are separated by an equals sign (=). 若要存取以單一字串形式的查詢資料，取得屬性值從所傳回物件。To access the query data as a single string, get the property value from the object returned by . > [!NOTE] > 查詢不包含等號 (範例： [ http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name ](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) ) 加入至`null`中的索引鍵。Queries without an equal sign (example: [http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name](http://www.contoso.com/query.htm?Name) ) are added to the `null` key in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RawUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ RawUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端所要求的 URL 資訊 (不含主機和連接埠)。

span.span: Gets the URL information (without the host and port) requested by the client.

value.span: ，包含這個要求的原始 URL。

span.span: A that contains the raw URL for this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 原始 URL 定義為下列網域資訊的 URL 的一部分。The raw URL is defined as the part of the URL following the domain information. URL 字串中`http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`，原始的 URL 是`/articles/recent.aspx`。In the URL string `http://www.contoso.com/articles/recent.aspx`, the raw URL is `/articles/recent.aspx`. 如果有的話，原始 URL 會包含查詢字串。The raw URL includes the query string, if present. 若要取得主機和連接埠資訊，請使用屬性。To obtain the host and port information, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RemoteEndPoint As IPEndPoint
public: property System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ RemoteEndPoint { System::Net::IPEndPoint ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the client IP address and port number from which the request originated.

value.span: ，表示起始要求的 IP 位址和連接埠編號。

span.span: An that represents the IP address and port number from which the request originated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServiceName As String
public: property System::String ^ ServiceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端透過要求傳送的服務提供者名稱 (SPN)。

span.span: Gets the Service Provider Name (SPN) that the client sent on the request.

value.span: ，包含用戶端透過要求傳送的 SPN。

span.span: A that contains the SPN the client sent on the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以使用屬性來執行自訂服務提供名稱 (SPN) 驗證。An application could use the property to perform custom Service Provide Name (SPN) validation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransportContext As TransportContext
public: property System::Net::TransportContext ^ TransportContext { System::Net::TransportContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端要求的 。

span.span: Gets the for the client request.

value.span: 用戶端要求的 物件。

span.span: A object for the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來擷取通道的繫結 token (CBT)送出使用 HTTPS。The property can be used to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) for an which was sent using HTTPS. 應用程式可以使用屬性來執行自訂驗證使用呼叫至原生 Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021)函式。An application could use the property to perform custom authentication using calls to the native Win32 [AcceptSecurityContext](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=147021) function. 如果應用程式嘗試擷取此通道繫結 token (CBT)屬性使用方法和不，然後在將會擲回。If an application attempts to retrieve the channel binding token (CBT) from this property using the method and the is not , then the will throw . 會覆寫具有內部實作的方法。The overrides the method with an internal implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端所要求的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object requested by the client.

value.span: 物件，識別用戶端所要求的資源。

span.span: A object that identifies the resource requested by the client.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性可讓您取得所有的可用資訊物件。The property allows you to obtain all the information available from a object. 如果您需要知道 URI 要求的原始文字，請考慮使用屬性改為。If you need to know only the raw text of the URI request, consider using the property instead. 屬性為 null 如果從用戶端無法剖析。The property is null if the from the client could not be parsed. 屬性會指出如果而不是轉換後的 URI 轉換百分比編碼的任何值，會採取其他的正規化步驟會使用原始的未逸出的 URI。The property indicates if uses the raw unescaped URI instead of the converted URI where any percent-encoded values are converted and other normalization steps are taken. 當執行個體收到要求時透過`http.sys`服務，它會建立所提供的 URI 字串的執行個體`http.sys`，並公開其為屬性。When a instance receives a request through the `http.sys` service, it creates an instance of the URI string provided by `http.sys`, and exposes it as the property. `http.sys`服務會公開兩個要求 URI 字串：The `http.sys` service exposes two request URI strings: - 未經處理的 URIRaw URI - 已轉換的 URIConverted URI 未經處理的 URI 是提供 HTTP 要求的要求行中：The raw URI is the provided in the request line of a HTTP request: `GET /path/` `Host: www.contoso.com` 所提供的原始 URI`http.sys`上面所提的要求是"/ 路徑 /"。The raw URI provided by `http.sys` for the request mentioned above, is "/path/". 這表示它已透過網路傳送接下來的 HTTP 動詞命令的字串。This represents the string following the HTTP verb as it was sent over the network. `http.sys`服務要求使用 HTTP 要求行中所提供的 URI 中所提供的資訊建立轉換的 URI 和主機標頭，以判斷原始伺服器的要求應該會轉送到。The `http.sys` service creates a converted URI from the information provided in the request using the URI provided in the HTTP request line and the Host header to determine the origin server the request should be forwarded to. 這是藉由比較一組已註冊的 URI 前置詞的要求中的資訊。This is done by comparing the information from the request with a set of registered URI prefixes. 為了能夠比較這些值，需要完成一些正規化的要求。In order to be able to compare those values, some normalization to the request needs to be done. 轉換 URI 上述範例應如下：For the sample above the converted URI would be as follows: `http://www.contoso.com/path/` `http.sys`服務結合屬性值，並要求條線建立轉換的 URI 中的字串。The `http.sys` service combines the property value and the string in the request line to create a converted URI. 此外，`http.sys`和類別也會執行下列動作：In addition, `http.sys` and the class also do the following: - 取消-逸出所有百分比編碼值。Un-escapes all percent encoded values. - 轉換百分比編碼為 utf-16 字元表示法的非 ASCII 字元。Converts percent-encoded non-ASCII characters into a UTF-16 character representation. 請注意，utf-8 與 ANSI/DBCS 字元支援以及 Unicode 字元 （Unicode 編碼使用 %uxxxx 格式）。Note that UTF-8 and ANSI/DBCS characters are supported as well as Unicode characters (Unicode encoding using the %uXXXX format). - 執行其他的正規化步驟，例如路徑壓縮。Executes other normalization steps, like path compression. 要求不包含任何百分比編碼值使用的編碼方式相關資訊，因為它可能無法判斷正確的編碼方式只是藉由剖析的百分比編碼值。Since the request doesn't contain any information about the encoding used for percent-encoded values, it may not be possible to determine the correct encoding just by parsing the percent-encoded values. 因此`http.sys`提供修改程序的兩個登錄機碼：Therefore `http.sys` provides two registry keys for modifying the process: |登錄機碼Registry Key|預設值Default Value|描述Description| |------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |EnableNonUTF8EnableNonUTF8|11|如果是零，`http.sys`接受只有 UTF 8 編碼的 Url。If zero, `http.sys` accepts only UTF-8-encoded URLs.

如果不是零，`http.sys`也接受 ANSI 編碼或 DBCS 編碼在要求中的 Url。If non-zero, `http.sys` also accepts ANSI-encoded or DBCS-encoded URLs in requests.| |FavorUTF8FavorUTF8|11|如果不是零，`http.sys`一律會嘗試解碼 URL 為 utf-8 第一次。 如果該轉換失敗，而且 EnableNonUTF8 為非零，Http.sys，然後嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或依 DBCS。If non-zero, `http.sys` always tries to decode a URL as UTF-8 first; if that conversion fails and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero, Http.sys then tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS.

如果是零 （和 EnableNonUTF8 為非零），`http.sys`嘗試將它解碼為 ANSI 或依 DBCS; 如果不成功，它會嘗試 utf-8 轉換。If zero (and EnableNonUTF8 is non-zero), `http.sys` tries to decode it as ANSI or DBCS; if that is not successful, it tries a UTF-8 conversion.| 當收到要求時，它會使用轉換的 URI 從`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。When receives a request, it uses the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. 沒有需要支援在 Uri 中的字元和數字以外的字元。There is a need for supporting characters besides characters and numbers in URIs. 範例是下列的 URI 用來擷取客戶的客戶資訊數字"1/3812":An example is the following URI, which is used to retrieve customer information for customer number "1/3812": `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1%2F3812')/` 請注意百分比編碼中的斜線的 Uri (%2f)。Note the percent-encoded slash in the Uri (%2F). 必須這樣做，因為在此情況下的斜線字元表示的資料，不是路徑分隔符號。This is necessary, since in this case the slash character represents data and not a path delimiter. 將字串傳遞至 Uri 建構函式會導致下列 URI:Passing the string to Uri constructor will lead to the following URI: `http://www.contoso.com/Customer('1/3812')/` 分割為其區段路徑會產生下列項目：Splitting the path into its segments would result in the following elements: `Customer('1` `3812')` 這不是寄件者要求的意圖。This is not the intent of the sender of the request. 如果屬性設定為 false，則當收到要求時，它會使用原始 URI，而不是從轉換過的 URI`http.sys`來作為輸入屬性。If the property is set to false, then when the receives a request, it uses the raw URI instead of the converted URI from `http.sys` as input to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UrlReferrer As Uri
public: property Uri ^ UrlReferrer { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端用來參考伺服器之資源的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the resource that referred the client to the server.

value.span: 物件，包含要求之 標頭的文字，如果要求中不包含此標頭，則為 。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header, or if the header was not included in the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端已要求的 uri 後面超連結，可能會包含其要求`Referrer`識別包含超連結的資源 URI 的標頭。If a client has followed a hyperlink to the requested URI, its request might contain a `Referrer` header that identifies the URI of the resource that contained the hyperlink. 用戶端可以假造或選擇不呈現標頭。Clients can falsify or choose not to present a header. 因此，雖然可用於識別網路流量的基本趨勢屬性; 您不應使用它做為授權配置的一部分來控制資料的存取權。Therefore, while the property can be useful for identifying basic trends in Web traffic; you should not use it as part of an authorization scheme to control access to data. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 為 null 時沒有任何`Referrer`要求標頭或當`Referrer`標頭在要求中存在，但是不會剖析為有效。The is null when there is no `Referrer` header in the request or when the `Referrer` header is present in the request but does not parse to a valid . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserAgent As String
public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端所表示的使用者代理程式。

span.span: Gets the user agent presented by the client.

value.span: 物件，包含要求之 標頭的文字。

span.span: A object that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `User-Agent`頁首通常會包含用來識別用來產生要求的軟體名稱和版本號碼文字。The `User-Agent` header typically contains text that identifies the name and version number of the software used to generate the request. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. 為 null 時沒有任何`User-Agent`要求標頭。The is null when there is no `User-Agent` header in the request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserHostAddress As String
public: property System::String ^ UserHostAddress { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求所導向到的伺服器 IP 位址和連接埠編號。

span.span: Gets the server IP address and port number to which the request is directed.

value.span: ，包含主機位址資訊。

span.span: A that contains the host address information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的資訊也會提供屬性值。The information returned by this property is also available in the property value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserHostName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserHostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 DNS 名稱和用戶端所指定的連接埠編號 (如果有提供的話)。

span.span: Gets the DNS name and, if provided, the port number specified by the client.

value.span: 值，包含要求之 標頭的文字。

span.span: A value that contains the text of the request's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Host`標頭包含要求的伺服器主機名稱和通訊埠編號，如果指定，以冒號分隔 (例如， `www.contoso.com:8080`)。The `Host` header contains the requested server host name and port number, if specified, separated by a colon (for example, `www.contoso.com:8080`). 您可以使用這個屬性傳回不同的回應，根據要求中指定的主機名稱。You can use this property to return different responses depending on the host name specified in the request. 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates using this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserLanguages As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ UserLanguages { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得回應慣用的自然語言。

span.span: Gets the natural languages that are preferred for the response.

value.span: 陣列，包含要求的 標頭中所指定的語言，如果用戶端要求沒有包含 標頭，則為 。

span.span: A array that contains the languages specified in the request's header or if the client request did not include an header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細的說明`Accept-Language`標頭，請參閱 RFC 2616 區段位於 14.4 [ https://www.rfc-editor.org ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For a detailed description of the `Accept-Language` header, see RFC 2616 Section 14.4, available at [https://www.rfc-editor.org](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). 如需完整的要求標頭清單，請參閱列舉型別。For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示從要求的語言`Accept-Language`標頭。The following code example displays the languages from the request's `Accept-Language` header. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#15)]
